sentences: In the years 1927 to 1931 he attended the School of Professional Organists in  Montwiłła, Vilnius, then he studied at the Vilnius Conservatory of Music with Mieczysław Karłowicz, in the class of Wladyslaw Kalinowski (1932-1934), and also  composition with Tadeusz Szeligowski from 1934-1939.
